an4.140:4.3: Atthi, bhikkhave, vādī atthato pariyādānaṃ gacchati, no byañjanato;
an4.140:4.4: atthi, bhikkhave, vādī byañjanato pariyādānaṃ gacchati, no atthato;
an4.140:4.5: atthi, bhikkhave, vādī atthato ca byañjanato ca pariyādānaṃ gacchati;
an4.140:4.6: atthi, bhikkhave, vādī nevatthato no byañjanato pariyādānaṃ gacchati.
an4.140:4.8: Aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso yaṃ catūhi paṭisambhidāhi samannāgato atthato vā byañjanato vā pariyādānaṃ gaccheyyā”ti.
